name: Grapher Settings File
summary: Learn about .SBGF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Grapher online program can plot any number of coordinates and allows you to customize the background color, line color, text color, and more. The SBGF file enables you to save all your settings to be used at a later time.

description: Settings file created and used by Grapher, an online graph plotting program; contains settings for a graph, which includes points, axes, graph plotting options, and appearance information.
